resources.string: Create an ability with description only.
Create an ability to add extra feat points.
Create an ability to add extra skill points.
Create an ability to assign a spell list to it.
You\'re welcome to join the open source project on GitHub: https://github.com/twiederk/d20Framework/
Please report suggestions and problems to torsten.wiederkehr@gmail.com

Thanks to Holger Trapp for supplying spells of DnD v.3.5\nThanks to Zhacrie White for entering description of goods of DnD v.3.5\nThanks to Michel Chartrand for entering the races of the Advanced Races Guide

You\'re welcome to join the open source project: https://github.com/twiederk/d20Framework/

Release 1.7.0
- Prestige Classes added
- Bug Fix. AC, Ini and BAB was not display for high level characters
- Import/Export skills and delete all skills deactivated

Release 1.8.0
- Character class administration added
- Capitalize of first letters added
- Performance of skill saving improved

Release 1.9.0
- Equipment list with weapons, armor and goods added
- Calculation of load added

Release 1.10.0
- Magic weapons and armor added
- Data on orientation change retained

Release 1.11.0
- Weapon creation and edition added
- FAQs and history added to homepage (see http://www.d20CharacterSheet.com)

Release 1.11.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurred by expanding detail data of armor and goods

Release 1.12.0
- Armor creation and edition added

Release 1.12.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurred by adding images with Android 2.x

Release 1.13.0
- Good creation and edition added

Release 1.14.0
- Sub races added
- Racial abilities added
- Support large screens (Samsung Galaxy Tab)
- Knowledge (locale) set as class skill for Rogue
- Spelling fixed in German version
- Wait anmimation while creating database and loading gamesystem added

Release 1.15.0
- Custom races added
- Custom abilities added
- Counting feats added
- Quick add and subtract of money, hit points and experience points added
- Names of abilities extended

Release 1.16.0
- Note section added
- Support app installation on external storage media (sd-card)
- Entering of max HP improved
- Fixed typing error in racial abilities

Release 1.17.0
- Items support masterwork
- Last activity stays active if app is put in background

Release 1.18.0
- Character class abilities added
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurred by displaying character sheet with Android 3.0

Release 1.19.0
- Class Abilities administration added
- Reference description of skills added
- Grapple score added

Release 1.19.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurred by adding images on Motorola devices

Release 1.20.0
- Choice between background image and color added
- Administration of abilities simplified

Release 1.21.0
- Spells added
- Background image of different sizes supported

Release 2.0.0
- Pathfinder support added
- Bug Fix. Fixed missing money tab on tablets
- Performance of masks to add and edit classes of character improved
- German version removed

Release 2.0.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed calculation of skills for Pathfinder

Release 2.1.0
- Checkable abilities
- Pathfinder: Support ability Skilled in calculation of available skill points
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurring by adding images with Android 3.x
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurring by deleting a character. The equipment and notes of the deleted character remained in the database.

Release 2.2.0
- Added attack and damage rolls
- Moved abilities right to appearance
- DnDv35: Added description to weapons and armor

Release 2.2.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug occurred loading customized weapons

Release 2.3.0
- Checkable spells added
- Support of different XP Tables added
- Added CMB and CMD
- Display XP in red if they doesn't match character level
- Display checkboxes of selected abilities and spells only if "Show All" is checked
- Bug Fix: Display masterwork in list of weapons when creating an attack
- Bug Fix: Display spell lists only of owned abilities
- Bug Fix: Weapon Focus checked weapon name instead of weapon family
- Bug Fix: Fix weight of Pathfinder "Rations, trail (per day)" from 11 to 1

Release 2.4.0
- Optimization for tablets
- DnDv35: Description of goods added

Release 2.6.0
- Added misc modifier for attack and damage rolls
- Support Backup & Restore for Android
- Save data if dialog is closed by touching outside of it
- Bug fix: Amazon Kindle: Images couldn't be added
- Bug fix: Platinum coins weren't saved
- Bug fix: Pathfinder: Wizard and Sorcerer couldn't be edited in class administration
- Bugfix: Thumbnails weren't scaled correctly in character list

Release 2.6.1
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug displaying notes in one line only

Release 2.7.0
- Added Backup & Restore to/from File (SD Card)
- Bug Fix: Fixed display of misc modifier buttons in edit skill mask on phones
- Bug Fix: Fixed removing an item while adding a new one to the equipment list
- Bug Fix: Allow negative values for misc attack and damage modifier
- Pathfinder: Bug Fix: Fixed base attack bonus of Rogue from good to average

Release 2.8.0
- Added export and import of characters
- Display skills in one line on 7 inch devices
- Bug Fix: App crashed by assigning spell ability to a class or race in administration
- Bug Fix: Display bonuses with two digits on buttons correctly

Release 2.9.0
- Added export and import of weapons, armor and goods. I would like to offer new equipment to import via download from the homepage (www.d20charactersheet.com). If you have items you want to share with other users of the app. It would be great if you send me your exported items and I will place them on the homepage for download. Please contact me via torsten.wiederkehr@gmail.com
- Reduced memory requirements to improve stability, while app is running in background

Release 2.10.0
- Added creation of spells.
- Added creation of spell lists and assign spells to them.
- Added creation of spell abilities to assign spell lists to them. By assigning spell abilities to a race or class you can assign your own spell lists with your own spells to your character.
- Added search to all administration menus.
- Bug fix: Fixed calculation of CMD.
- Bug fix: Fixed import of masterwork items.
- Bug fix: Fixed adding skills to classes in skill administration.

Release 2.11.0
- Added spell preparation. The tab Spells is replaced by two new tabs. The tab Known Spells allows to select the spells the character knows from a spell list and displays how many spells the character is allowed to known per spell level. The tab Spell Slots shows the spell slots of the character. Each spell slot can be touched to select a spell. A spell slot displays the name, DC, ability and school of the spell. Spell slots are in the color of the school to easily identify counter spells. After a spell is cast, the color changes to grey and the spell name is stroked through. Metamagic feats are supported.
- Added search field to add/remove equipment mask.
- Added Immediate and Swift action" to casting time.
- Bug Fix. Fixed bug when adding extra points received by an extra feat ability of a class.

Release 2.11.1
Bug fix: Fixed missing spells slots of max spell level of spell list
Bug fix: Fixed spell slots lower then min level of spell list
Bug fix: Fixed modifying spell list abilities created before version 2.11.0
Bug fix: Fixed saving of skills, including negative modifiers

Release 2.11.2
Bug fix: Fixed missing icon in action bar to export equipment
Bug fix: Fixed missing result of die roll on high density devices
Bug fix: Fixed unreadable labels on buttons on high density devices

Release 2.11.3
Bug fix: Fixed missing result of die roll, if many dice were rolled
Bug fix: Fixes width of edit field, if number had many digits
Bug fix: Fixed crash, if number of damage dice was zero
Bug fix: Fixed position of saves for character with long class name

Release 2.11.4
Bug fix: Updated project to current technology

Release 2.11.6
Bug fix: Added Espresso tests to administration

Release 2.11.7
Bug fix: Added Espresso tests to main

Release 2.11.8
Bug fix: Added Espresso tests to sheet

Release 2.11.9
Bug fix: Fixed display of dialogs

Release 2.12.2
- Added favorite action buttons to create an attack or a note
- Bug fix. Fixed text color of spell name in spell description
- Bug fix. Fixed display of dialogs in task manager

Release 2.12.3
- Bug fix: Fixed menu option to create a weapon/armor/good in administration
- Bug fix: Fixed not visible text to remove a class from a character
- Bug fix: Fixed app crash if a thumbnail image missing
- Bug fix: Fixed app crashed by adding a spell more than once to a spell list

Release 3.0.0
- Changed business model to be based on advertisement

Release 3.1.0
- Added premium version containing unlimited number of characters and remove of banner ad
- Added promo codes for existing users

Release 3.1.1
- Added import of characters to premium version
- Bug fix: App crashed by resuming it from background

Release 3.1.2
- Bug fix: Fixed crash in spell slots tab

Release 3.1.3
- Bug fix: Fixed crash on app startup on Lenovo devices with Android 6
- Bug fix: Fixed crash in known spells tab for sorcerers above level 20

Release 3.1.4
- Bug fix: Fixed crash on opening character sheet on Android 6
- Use latest version of d20framework containing SQLite support

Release 3.1.5
- Support Android 11 and requires at least Android 8
- Added note to join open source project
- Prepared app for new content of Pathfinder and DnD 5e
- Bug fix: Fixed height of release notes dialog

Release 3.1.6
- Bug fix: Fixed the crash when the character sheet was retrieved from the background

Release 3.1.7
- Bug fix: Fixed access to external storage on Android 10+

Release 3.2.0
- Support app bundles to save storage space.

Release 3.3.0
- Added races of Advanced Race Guide to Pathfinder.

Release 3.3.1
- Increased font size on skill tab to increase readability.
